group_1.textCenter: I will join the Wings of the Magius.

group_1.narration: I gave my answer right away about@joining the Wings of the Magius...
I'd be lying if I said@I didn't feel guilty about Yumi.
But that wasn't it...
We became Magical Girls to get closer to@our dreams. I couldn't forgive the thought@that we'd disappear because of it.
I didn't want to fall into despair@and unleash curses, either.
I couldn't sit idly by@and accept such a fate...

group_1.textRight: Are you really sure? It's a big decision.

group_1.textLeft: Yes. I understand. I still wish for@liberation.
And you have been really honest with us...
If you believe that they can free us, then@I can believe in their methods.

group_1.textRight: I understand. Welcome.
[chara:800203:lipSynch_1]I...

group_1.textLeft: If you aren't sure, you should think it over@carefully.

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.narration: Yumi seemed hesitant, but later she@decided to join the Wings of the Magius.
Except...@She joined only because they say@they will liberate us, so I'm @a little bit worried about her...
To be honest...@I think I can trust Mifuyu, but I@don't think I can trust the Magius.
Though there's no denying@that they're very talented...
Oops! Keep this between us, okay?

group_1.textLeft: These are the Black Feathers you will @take charge of.

group_1.textRight: Got it.
(Huh? Is she looking at me? I wonder what...)
Oh!

group_1.narration: You know the rest.
I joined the Wings of the Magius,@where I became a Black Feather@and was reunited with you, Ryo.

group_1.textRight: That about sums it up...
I'm going to take back my future. And then,@I'm going to achieve my dream.

group_1.textLeft: That's great. It's good to have goals.

group_1.textRight: But?

group_1.textLeft: You want to succeed as a cutesy idol, right?
You might want to work on not breaking@character all the time.

group_1.textRight: [chara:305301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
W-waaaaaahhh! B-but this IS the real me!@I'm not breaking character at all!
I'm always super adorable! This is who I@really am, honest!
[chara:305301:lipSynch_1]R-Ryo... Saaay something, will you...
You not answering makes me really, really@extra sad! I feel so lonely, I might cry...

group_1.textLeft: I don't think it's a bad thing to have a real@you that's a little more serious inside.

group_1.textRight: Aww, no fair! You don't get to say stuff that@throws me off like that!
*Sniff* You're teasing me again...@You're such a meanie, you know.

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, I'm all talked out. I think I'm gonna@head home.

group_1.textRight: Gosh golly, it's this late already?! I'm@gonna be in big trouble if I'm late!
Oh... Um, Ryo?
Let's give it aaall we've got.
Yuppers! See ya tomorrow, Ryo!

group_1.narration: *Jingle* *Jingle*

group_1.textRight: Hey, Ikumin! You're looking adorable again@today.

group_1.textLeft: Really?! That makes me super-duper happy!

group_1.narration: ― Ikumi ―@My dream, and Yumi's dream...
― Ikumi ―@To become an idol, and a volleyball player.
― Ikumi ―@The dreams we traded@ended up meaning a lot to us.
― Ikumi ―@We won't let anything stand@in the way of our dreams...
― Ikumi ―@We'll overcome anything that gets@in our way and make them come true.
― Ikumi ―@We can overcome any kind of pain if@it's to make our dream a reality.

group_1.textCenter: (I don't want to turn into a Witch and curse@everyone...)

group_1.textRight: Head Maid! Please bring the sandwiches and@tea.

group_1.textCenter: (After all, you know, there's only ONE thing@I want to give to everyone...)

group_1.narration: Thanks sooo much for waiting!
I put lots of extra-special love into this@food just for you!

group_1.textCenter: Not once, but twice our dream held on. So we@had no choice but to cling to the Magius...
